column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////This place is great!! The place is super nice
column2: and I love the atmosphere. I also love that they have a live DJ some nights
column3: and their brunch is amazing!! The Bosscat burger is one of my favorites. All the servers and employees are attentive and very nice. The owners even take the time out of their busy restaurant to get to know the customers! I definitely recommend this place
